name: Kahakuhale Serevi
story: Kahakuhale Serevi grew up in the Caribbean where he was forced to learn how to defend himself at an early age. He joined the French Foreign Legion shortly after turning 18 where he honed his skills and eventually became a member of their special operations unit. After completing several missions, he left the foreign legion to pursue his own interests. He was later recruited by the INDEPENDENT faction to be their enforcer due to his proficiency with rifles and combat experience.
